description:
Step inside the Pitch Meeting that led to Megalopolis! 

Subscribe for more Pitch Meetings: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Kq-yEt1iYsbUzNOoIRK0g

Francis Ford Coppola has made some of the most beloved movies of all time, including The Godfather and Apocalypse Now. Now he’s created a movie he’s been aiming to make for multiple decades, and funded the entire thing himself. The result is the unchecked, unfiltered vision of a filmmaker, for better or worse.

Check out the pitch meeting that led to Megalopolis!

Check Out These Other Videos:

The Acolyte Pitch Meeting
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PqwEE6G6zaU

Deadpool & Wolverine Pitch Meeting
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kUrT2UErII8

Our Website
http://screenrant.com/
title: Megalopolis Pitch Meeting
